snippet: Days after one high-stakes standoff over finances was resolved, the two sides are getting ready for another as Congress prepares to address the nation’s borrowing limit.
abstract: Pres Obama and Republicans, in dueling weekly addresses, prepare for their next fiscal showdown; it could come as early as February, when Congressional fight is expected on raising nation's borrowing limit.
lead_paragraph: Days after one high-stakes standoff over finances was resolved, the two sides are getting ready for another as Congress prepares to address the nation’s borrowing limit.

headline.seo: Obama and G.O.P. Gear Up for Next Fiscal Fight
headline.main: Obama and Republicans Gear Up for Next Fiscal Fight
headline.print_headline: Obama and Republicans Gear Up for Next Fiscal Fight
